title: Zoe Kravitz stuns trouser suit golden top art museum gala
title_page: Zoe Kravitz stuns trouser suit golden top art museum gala | Daily Mail Online
text:
She is the daughter of two leading showbusiness stars.
So no wonder Zoe Kravitz was looking to the red carpet born as she posed up a storm wearing Oscar de la Renta at a gala in New York on Wednesday.
The blonde beauty looked like she was having a great time as she showcased her fabulous figure before mingling with some fellow celebrities at the Whitney Biennial at The Whitney Museum of American Art.
Golden girl: Zoe Kravitz stole the show in Oscar de la Renta at the Whitney Biennial at The Whitney Museum of American Art in New York on Wednesday
The 28-year-old fine filly looked in good form indeed in her black Oscar de la Renta trouser suit, which she combined with a golden top by the designer, high heels and black French calf TRO bag with 24 kt gardenia. She accessorized with Tiffany & Co. jewelry.
Indeed she managed to outshine such beauties as overrated guitarist St. Vincent, who was famously once Kristen Stewart's lover, and Girls star Zosia Mamet.
Zoe is the daughter of self-styled rock star Lenny Kravitz and his former Cosby Show star wife Lisa Bonet.
And her decision to follow in her mother's footsteps seems wise, as she has been getting reasonable reviews for her most recent role in hit TV series Big Little Lies.
A Bonet lass: The daughter of Cosby Show star Lisa was looking in fine form donning Tiffany & Co. jewelry
Trousering all the attention: She certainly wore her Oscar de la Renta trouser suit with confidence
My Girl: She looked thrilled to be posing up with Zosia Mamet
